Blacks have their lives disrupted every day? Yes, mostly by other Blacks: 91% murdered by other Blacks. & Guess what? Whites and Latinos also have their lives disrupted every day: 84% of murders done by fellow Whites and Latinos. But here is the real deal: Whites & Latinos are 2X more likely to be murdered by Blacks than vice-versa. As for Muslims being kicked off of planes, okay, how often does that REALLY happen? You didn't provide statistics for it when repeatedly asked. By your own admission you don't know how often. Well, when it does happen it makes huge news and we are told that there was no justification for it only to find out later that the crew and security were 100% justified as occurred in Minneapolis, MN at the US Airways incident.

There is a family in my neighborhood that is very similar to this! They wear blue clothes all the time, so we call them The Blues! They're all adults now and the father passed away, as did their mother, but still remain in the house together. Very creepy!!! I'm sure they all have normal human sexual urges....yuck!! We NEVER see ANY visitors at the home and one of the only outings they take, is some jogging around the area. They don't speak to anyone either. Only to each other. They do have a car but not sure how they get $$ because no one ever leaves the home very often. Social Security maybe. Who knows... They always keep the curtains shut too!! This was interesting to read because I thought The Blues were possibly the only people that did this!
It took you 5 years and how many millions of dollars to figure that out?????
Thank you for making this election cycle more bearable!!!
